reasoning.final_answer: Walk forward along the street and cross to the right to reach "Ashraf's Take Away Strictly Halaal."

This building occupies a prominent position in the left quarter of the image, directly facing the red building.
reasoning.final_answer: The multi-story building with a white facade and colored stripes is directly visible across the street from the red building with green trim.
